title: Cool block-letter font and others from ESPN Magazine
content:
[http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=espnmagfontscp5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120428180336/http:/img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=espnmagfontscp5.jpg "http://img527.imageshack.us/my.php?image=espnmagfontscp5.jpg")

Three interesting fonts I saw in ESPN magazine. I'm sure I've seen the second one before, but I can't put my finger on it. Thanks for any help IDing them.
author: dtschmidt

comments.content: The text is Apex Serif I believe.
Thanks! Now just to figure out the last one...
